CHAT.comment: STOP THE BEACH RENOURISHMENT, INC., Petitioner v. FLORIDA DEPARTMENT OF ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION, ET AL.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:02 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF D. KENT SAFRIET ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF SCOTT D. MAKAR ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENTS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF EDWIN S. KNEEDLER ON BEHALF OF THE UNITED STATES, AS AMICI CURIAE, SUPPORTING THE RESPONDENTS
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF D. KENT SAFRIET ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 11:04 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
